Astro Simple blog theme

simple blog is a simple blog theme for Astro.

Credits

This theme is built upon a theme called simple-blog for hugo. Full design credit goes to 10mohi6.

Features

  • content
  • view transitions
  • pagination
  • tags
  • categories
